name: After School Program
description: Daily afternoon activities are focused on Experiential Learning and incorporate a combination of visual arts, music + movement, drama + storytelling, STEM, yoga + mindfulness, and culture and community all happening in a Spanish Immersion environment. Hours: 2:00 - 6:00 pm on Mon / Tue / Thu / Fri, and 1:00 - 6:00 pm on Wednesdays.

howToGetIt: If you're interested in applying please submit the Online Application Form, and submit a non-refundable New Family Application Fee of $40. Please DO NOT email asking if there are spots available before sending in your Application Form. Enrollment priority is given to previously enrolled families, and families who have registered for Summer Camps or other Aventuras' programs. Once your application is received, please allow time for review. When the application has been reviewed and you will be advised if a spot is available, and next steps; or if you've been placed on our waitlist.
